casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Riddle, Appellant.
Submitted March 11, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Lee M. Brewster, for appellant.
Scurry W. Gent, Jr., District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
April 16, 1968:
